findings.title: Liquidity Protocol Automatic Lock
findings.description: After minting LP, the Liquidity Protocol will be locked automatically

findings.title: A floating pragma is set. [SWC-103]
findings.description: The current pragma Solidity directive is not fixed, which can cause varying bytecode production between builds.

findings.title: Potential use of "block.number" as source of randomness.
findings.description: The environment variable "block.number" looks like it might be used as a source of randomness which can be manipulated by a malicious miner.
